title: Handle Lot Tracking for Recalls
description: A wholesaler of food products must track lot numbers to manage potential recalls.

tasks.description: When receiving goods, record the lot number for each item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lot number is entered into the inventory system upon receipt.

tasks.description: When shipping goods, record which lot numbers are being sent to which customers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system links specific lot numbers to specific sales orders.

tasks.description: In the event of a recall, use the system to quickly identify all customers who received the affected lot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent can instantly generate a list of customers who need to be notified about the recall.
